settings.heading: Payment Options
settings.row_content:
We accept the following payment methods:
Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, Diners Club, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Klarna, Maestro, UnionPay, and PayPal.


All payments except PayPal are securely processed via Shopify Payments. For your privacy, all credit card transactions will appear as billed by Ailsas. Packages are shipped from Ailsas.


Please note: In accordance with PayPal’s best practice guidelines, orders paid via PayPal are captured within 24–72 hours of order placement.

settings.heading: Order Processing
settings.row_content:
Our dispatch days are Monday to Friday, 10:00am–5:00pm (excluding public holidays).

Orders require 1–2 working days to be processed before shipping. Our dispatch days are Monday to Friday, 10:00am–5:00pm (excluding public holidays).Once your order is marked as “shipped,” we are unable to make any changes or cancellations.Please ensure all billing and shipping details are accurate to avoid delays or extra charges. If updates are necessary, contact us at hello@ailsas.com  as soon as possible.

settings.heading: Tracking Your Order
settings.row_content:
For the most efficient service, please be sure to register an account with us!

Go to ailsas.com If you are using your phone or tablet, click on the ‘Account’ button located under the Ailsas.com logo. If you using a desktop or laptop, click on the ‘Account’ button located above the search bar on the right-hand side. Follow the login prompt by entering your email and password. Once you’ve logged into your account, under the ‘Order History’ section and click on the Order you are wanting to track. If your order has shipped, a Royal Mail tracking number will be added under the Product information.

Once your order has shipped, you will also receive email updates from Royal Mail with shipping and tracking information to the email address you used to place your order.

settings.heading: Backorders
settings.row_content:
Occasionally backorders occur when requests for a particular item exceed available inventory.

If a backorder occurs on your ordered product, we will contact you via email and you will be given the option to:(1) select a new item, (2) request to be placed on a priority waitlist to receive the product once it becomes available for shipment (Note: we will complete the charge to the payment method used with your original order), or (3) cancel the original order. If we do not hear back on which backorder option you choose, backorders are canceled after 2 days and credited back to their payment source.

We will promptly ship the item(s) once they become available with the original shipping method selected at checkout. For orders containing multiple products, if there are products in the order that are not available for delivery, we will contact you by email as soon as possible. If you do not respond to the email within two working days, we will only issue refunds for non-shippable items, and shippable items will be shipped normally. 

For more information, please contact us by email at hello@ailsas.com.

settings.heading: Coupons
settings.row_content:
Coupon usage rules:

·Coupons must be used in a single transaction.

·Only one coupon code can be applied per order, per customer.

·Most coupons are single-use only unless otherwise stated.

·Coupons must be applied at checkout and cannot be retroactively added.

·Coupons are not redeemable for cash, gift cards, or store credit.

·No reproductions, substitutions, or rain checks are accepted.

·Discounts apply to product price only, not taxes, shipping, or handling fees.

·Return or exchange of discounted items may result in an adjusted refund.

·Coupon eligibility may vary by promotion. Ailsas.com reserves final interpretation.

settings.heading: Shipping & Handling
settings.row_content:
We recommend all deliveries be made to a physical address so packages can be tracked and delivered correctly.

We offer FREE Standard Shipping for orders over in the UK and have multiple shipping options to make sure your purchase arrives on time. Note: For the card holder's protection, the company reserves the right to send orders to the billing address if a differing shipping address cannot be verified.

Orders may take between 1-3 working days to process before shipping out.

settings.heading: Shipping Options
settings.row_content:
• We offer 2 shipping options:
  • Royal Mail
  • DPD

    We will select courier service providers for delivery according to the actual situation. The products you purchased will only be sent by the above-mentioned courier companies, and you cannot choose independently when purchasing.

settings.heading: Exchange Policy
settings.row_content: Your satisfaction is our goal. We accept returns on all eligible products within 30 days from the date the order is shipped. Please see our Return Policy for our eligible product standards.

settings.heading: Additional Shipping
settings.row_content: Charges For shipments returned to Ailsas.com due to bad address information or refusal upon delivery, there will be a 5£ fee automatically charged.

settings.heading: Shipping Delays
settings.row_content:
Shipping delays may occur due to holidays, natural disasters, or carrier delays. Please keep in mind holidays and weekends do not count as business days and should be considered when calculating shipping times.If you need additional information, please email hello@Ailsas.com.

If you are concerned with weather delaying your order, check the Service Alerts page on DPD or Royal Mail for updated notices about shipping delays due to weather.

settings.heading: Sales Tax
settings.row_content: Ailsas.com is required to collect sales tax according to UK sales tax law. The appropriate charges will be added to your order total during checkout and displayed on your final order confirmation. If you have questions about your sales tax, please contact your local tax office.

settings.heading: Policy Changes
settings.row_content: Ailsas.com reserves the right at our discretion to make changes to these policies at any time. Please check this page periodically for changes.

settings.heading: Fraud & Theft
settings.row_content: CREDIT CARD FRAUD AND THEFT OF OUR MERCHANDISE IS ILLEGAL AND THOSE RESPONSIBLE WILL BE PROSECUTED

settings.heading: Final interpretation
settings.row_content: Ailsas.com reserves the right of final explanation of all policies.

settings.text: Sign up for exclusive discounts and stay in the know
